title: Developer Needed for CS Skins Marketplace with Onchain Support
content: We are looking for a skilled developer to create a CS skins marketplace starting with the integration of one skin. The project involves onchain handling of skins and requires familiarity with both the Steam API and Solana Metaplex. If you have experience working with digital assets and blockchain technology, we would love to hear from you. Your expertise will help us build a seamless platform for users to buy, sell, and trade skins effectively.

title: Blockchain Developer Crypto coin developer
content:
We are looking for an experienced blockchain andsmartcontractdeveloper to help us build and deploy a highly volatile cryptocurrency. I want to create a highly volatile coin. After every single buy, the price increases, ensuring every user sells at a profit. Suggest which functions I should add to achieve this. Thesmartcontractshould be developed and deployed on either BinanceSmartChain (BSC) or Polygon, depending on which is more suitable for performance and low transaction fees.
We will handle the deployment and liquidity addition, but we need your step-by-step support preferably via AnyDesk to ensure everything is executed correctly, including deploying thecontractand adding liquidity on Uniswap. It‚Äôs essential that the coin works flawlessly and that the price spikes significantly with each transaction.
If you have proven experience creating customsmartcontractsand launching tokens on DEX platforms, we‚Äôd love to work with you.

title: Senior Blockchain Developer
content:
We are looking for an experienced and reliable Blockchain Developer to help us build a robust and scalable NFT marketplace. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience withsmartcontractdevelopment, NFT standards (ERC-721, ERC-1155), blockchain integration, and security best practices.


Project Scope:

Our goal is to create a user-friendly, secure, and scalable NFT platform where users can mint, buy, sell, and trade NFTs. The marketplace will support features like user wallets, royalty enforcement, bidding/auctionfunctionality, metadata management, and more.


Responsibilities:

- Design and implementsmartcontracts(ERC-721/ERC-1155)
- Integratesmartcontractswith a frontend/backend system
- Develop secure wallet connection (MetaMask, WalletConnect, etc.)
- Implement minting, listing, buying, andauctionfunctions
- Ensure scalability and security of blockchain interactions
- Provide documentation and support forsmartcontractdeployment
- Collaborate with frontend/backend developers


Requirements:

- Proven experience with Ethereum, Solidity, andsmartcontractdevelopment
- Familiarity with NFT standards (ERC-721, ERC-1155)
- Experience with Web3.js, Ethers.js, or similar libraries
- Understanding of blockchain security best practices
- Experience with IPFS, Pinata, or other decentralized storage solutions
- Familiarity with NFT metadata standards and media handling
- Prior experience developing or contributing to an NFT marketplace is a plus
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills

title: Seeking Experienced Developer to Build Ethereum Sniper Bot for enableTrading() Function
content:
Project Overview:
I will provide the tokencontractaddress ahead of time.

The bot must monitor thecontractin real-time and execute a buy transaction the moment trading is enabled (i.e., right after enableTrading() is called).

The goal is to be among the first buyers once trading is live.

üõ†Ô∏è Requirements:
Strong experience with Ethereumsmartcontracts, Web3.js or Ethers.js.

Experience building sniper bots or MEV strategies is highly preferred.

Bot should be fast, gas-optimized, and ideally handle nonce management, slippage, and front-running protection.

Must be able to monitor mempool and decodecontracttransactions to detect enableTrading() as it hits the chain.

Optional: Support for proxycontractsor obfuscated launch patterns.

‚úÖ Deliverables:
Fully functional Ethereum sniper bot (preferably in Node.js or Python, but open to suggestions).

Instructions for deploying and running the bot.

Source code with comments and documentation.

Test run on a testnet (or with simulation) to verify functionality.

üîê Security&Confidentiality:
You must follow best practices in coding, avoid exposing private keys, and ensure that the bot runs securely.

title: Blockchain Developer Needed for Innovative Project
content: We are looking for a talented blockchain developer to join our team to work on an exciting new project. The ideal candidate should have experience in developing decentralized applications andsmartcontracts. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing blockchain technology as well as contributing to the overall architecture and infrastructure of our project. title: Blockchain Developer for Innovative Online Shop Project
content:
About Us:
CryptoCommerce Co. is an exciting startup focused on developing cutting-edge online shop solutions. As we transition into the blockchain space, we are eager to integrate cryptocurrency into our platform to enhance our earning model and provide a seamless shopping experience.

Position Overview:
We are seeking a talented Blockchain Developer to join our dedicated development team. This role is crucial as we aim to build a robust online shop that leverages blockchain technology. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in blockchain development and a passion for creating innovative solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
Design and implement blockchain-based solutions for our online shop.
Collaborate with our web development team to integrate cryptocurrency functionalities.
Ensure the security and scalability of blockchain applications.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in blockchain technology.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in blockchain development (Ethereum, Hyperledger, etc.).
Strong programming skills in languages such as Solidity, JavaScript, or Python.
Familiarity withsmartcontractsand decentralized applications (dApps).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Why Join Us?
Be part of an innovative project at the forefront of the blockchain revolution.
Work in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
Opportunity for growth and development within the company.

How to Apply:
If you are interested in this exciting opportunity, please fill out the application form linked below:
https://form.jotform.com/250075465405050

We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially welcoming you to our team!

title: Experienced Solidity Developer for BSC LotterySmartContract
content:
We are looking for a skilled Solidity developer to design, develop, and deploy a secure and audited LotterySmartContracton BinanceSmartChain (BSC). Thecontractshould include features like:  

Key Requirements:
‚úÖ Fully decentralized lottery system (Chainlink VRF or other secure RNG for fairness).  
‚úÖ Multi-tier ticket purchases (users can buy multiple tickets in one transaction).  
‚úÖ Automated prize distribution (percentage-based to winners, treasury, and burn).  
‚úÖ BNB/USDT payment support (or other BEP-20 tokens).  
‚úÖ Admin controls (start/end lottery, emergency withdrawal, fee adjustments).

Nice-to-Have Features:
üîπ Staking rewards for long-term participants.  
üîπ Referral system (bonus tickets for referrals).  
üîπ Gas optimization for low-cost transactions.  
üîπ Audit readiness (code should be clean and well-documented).  


Budget&Timeline:
üíµ Budget: $300(fixed price or hourly, based on experience).  
‚è≥ Timeline: Expected completion within 2‚Äì4 days.  

Would you like any modifications (e.g., adding KYC requirements, multi-chain¬†support,¬†etc.)?

title: Developer Needed for Simple Voting Ticket System on Sui Blockchain
content:
I‚Äôm looking for a blockchain developer to help build a small voting ticket system using the Sui network. The idea is to create a basicsmartcontractthat allows users to receive or buy voting tickets, and then use those tickets to vote on different options. Each ticket should count as one vote, and the system should prevent double voting.

This will be a lightweight implementation focused on core functionality, not a full application. The main goal is to get a workingsmartcontracton the Sui testnet (or mainnet, if ready), with clear and simple logic.

The system does not need a complex UI‚Äîjust the backend logic is enough for now. If you have experience with Sui and Move, and you're comfortable building small, efficientcontracts, this should be a quick and straightforward job.

Please reach out with a short summary of your experience and a rough estimate of your time and cost. This is a low-budget task, so I'm looking for something simple and functional rather than advanced¬†features.

title: Developer of Decentralized Exchange with Blockchain Development Team
content:
We are seeking a developer to join our team in building a high-performance decentralized exchange supporting cross-chain swaps and hybrid liquidity mechanisms (AMM + order book).

Requirements!

Professional expertise in Solidity or Rust forsmartcontractdevelopment

Hands-on experience building DEX/DeFi protocols (similar to Uniswap, Curve)

Deep understanding of AMM mechanics, liquidity pools, and aggregators

Experience integrating oracles (Chainlink, Pyth) and cross-chain bridges

Proficiency in Web3.js/ethers.js and blockchain node interaction

Responsibilities:

Develop and optimize exchangesmartcontracts(gas efficiency, security)

Implement cross-chain functionality and bridge integrations

Design and configure liquidity pools with various algorithms

Enable frontend-blockchain interaction via The Graph

Conduct testing and code audits (Hardhat, Foundry)

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with zk-rollups or other L2 solutions

Contributions to open-source DeFi protocols

Understanding of tokenomics and liquidity incentive mechanisms

Conditions!

Remote work with flexible hours

Long-term collaboration

Competitive compensation (negotiable)

Candidates should provide examples of previous DeFi-related work.

title: Fintech dApp Development for Bank/Stablecoin Integration
content:
**Job Opening: Fintech dApp Developer**

We are looking for a talented developer to join our team in building an innovative decentralized application (dApp) tailored for the fintech sector. This application will enable users to link their bank accounts and stablecoin wallets, like FVBank, to Uniswap liquidity pools, ensuring smooth transactions and enhanced liquidity for different cryptocurrencies.

The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in blockchain technology,smartcontractdevelopment, and user interface/user experience (UI/UX) design. This project represents a unique chance to engage with cutting-edge developments in decentralized finance and contribute to groundbreaking financial solutions. If you're passionate about fintech and blockchain innovation, we want to hear from you!
